name: DnDie
description:
Basically Dungeons and Dragons, but no interactions with people other than killing, no open world, very few types of enemies, no rolling dice(just choose what numbers you want and hope the Dungeon Master doesn't kill you for it). It's actually not like DnD at all?

Red Bar is Health, Green is xp and Blue is Mana

If tutorial seems broken, just go straight and do exactly what it says(it's kinda buggy)

First Thingy Woo!!

No main game cause time

All feedback much appreciated

Have a great day :)
